7 A student is asked to determine the spring constant of a spiral spring.Write a plan for an experiment to do this using standard laboratory apparatus and agraphical method.You should:(a) draw a labelled diagram of the experimental set-up to be used,(b) list any additional apparatus you might need,(c) state what quantity is the independent variable and what quantity is the dependentvariable,(d) describe how you would take your measurements and explain your choice ofmeasuring instruments,(e) explain how the data collected will be used to find the spring constant,(f) identify the main sources of uncertainty and/or systematic error,(g) comment on safety.P 41 63 7 A 0 6 1. 6
